price: ߢߊ߬ߒߡߊ߭ ߟߴߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߊ߫ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߦߋ߫ ߣߌ߬ߞߏ ߘߌ߫ ߛߊ߫ ߸ ߓߟߋ߬ߓߟߋ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbika dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
